name: allenai/c4
description: The AllenAI/C4 dataset is a massive, processed version of the Common Crawl dataset, available at https://commoncrawl.org. It consists of five variants: en, en.noclean, en.noblocklist, realnewslike, and multilingual (mC4). The en variant is 305GB, en.noclean is 2.3TB, en.noblocklist is 380GB, realnewslike is 15GB, and mC4 is 9.7TB with 108 subsets. This dataset is a valuable resource for researchers and developers working on language modeling, text classification, and other natural language processing tasks, as it provides a diverse and extensive collection of web-crawled data in multiple languages.
creator: allenai
inLanguage: af, am, ar, az, be, bg, bn, ca, ceb, co, cs, cy, da, de, el, en, eo, es, et, eu, fa, fi, fil, fr, fy, ga, gd, gl, gu, ha, haw, he, hi, hmn, ht, hu, hy, id, ig, is, it, iw, ja, jv, ka, kk, km, kn, ko, ku, ky, la, lb, lo, lt, lv, mg, mi, mk, ml, mn, mr, ms, mt, my, ne, nl, no, ny, pa, pl, ps, pt, ro, ru, sd, si, sk, sl, sm, sn, so, sq, sr, st, su, sv, sw, ta, te, tg, th, tr, uk, und, ur, uz, vi, xh, yi, yo, zh, zu
keywords: language-modeling, masked-language-modeling, Web Crawl Data, Text Corpus, NLP
